definition: the ability to understand and share the feelings of another
sentence: His empathy for others made him a great counselor.

definition: in accordance with the highest standards; faultless
sentence: Her impeccable taste in fashion always turned heads.

definition: producing a great deal of profit
sentence: He left his job for a more lucrative opportunity in a different field.
She enjoyed the tranquil atmosphere of the countryside.
The hapless explorer got lost in the mountains.

definition: a person who attacks or criticizes cherished beliefs or institutions
sentence: As an iconoclast, he challenged the traditional views of society.

definition: the state of being everywhere at once; omnipresence
sentence: The ubiquity of technology has transformed our daily lives.

definition: attractive or appealing in appearance or character
sentence: Her winsome smile charmed everyone in the room.

definition: the time at which something is most powerful or successful
sentence: The company reached its zenith during the tech boom.

definition: To leave hurriedly and secretly, typically to avoid detection or arrest.
sentence: The thief managed to abscond with the stolen jewels before the police arrived.
